meanings.sent1: The roseate flowers in the garden brightened up the whole yard.
meanings.sent2: The sky turned roseate as the sun began to set.
meanings.sent3: The roseate walls of the house made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a roseate melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The roseate painting on the wall was a joy to behold.

meanings.definition: Having a pink or reddish hue
meanings.sent1: She wore a roseate dress to the party and stood out among the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The roseate blush on her cheeks revealed her embarrassment.
meanings.sent3: The roseate sky at dawn painted a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: His roseate cheeks betrayed his excitement.
meanings.sent5: The roseate glow of the sunset was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Resembling a rose in color or appearance
meanings.sent1: The roseate petals of the flower looked delicate and lovely.
meanings.sent2: The roseate hue of the fabric reminded her of a blooming rose.
meanings.sent3: The roseate frosting on the cake made it look like a flower bed.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and roseate as a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The roseate glow of the room created a cozy atmosphere.
